Articles.Content:
We NEED a new wormhole mod. Probably something like the one in interstellar.

Imagine how awesome it would be if it was paired up with a mod like Multiple star systems. You can have a massive wormhole orbiting Jool that leads to the other star systems, and the blackhole in the center can be retextured to look like gargantua.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/103298-0-90-Working-Multiple-Star-Systems%28WITH-PLANETS%21%29?p=1604011#post1604011

The best part is that there already is a mod that adds in the gravitational lensing effects, so all we need now is someone willing to make the mod.

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/109269-Custom-Shader-Loader-2-0-release

Edited April 16, 2015 by DuoDex

Here's a list of all the current faster-than-light mods

In particular the ESLD Jump Beacons (0.90 fix) have the same mechanic as wormholes. If you swapped out the graphics and removed the fuel requirement, you're basically done.
